reviewText: In this movie, Shannon Tweed shows again that she is one of the sexy women of all time. Also, she knows how to be the character in her movies. Some people don't think of her as a good actress, but I think she is good and acting in the sex scenes is not easy either. Again her movies are not porn, but making it look like it is real is the key. Not any actress can do it and be so convincing and real like her. In this movie, she likes to find rich men to take their money. She uses her looks and her brain to get these men. She demonstrates how she make fall in love with her. There are only two sex scenes. Then, at the end a step daughter of one of these men finds out about and tries to get back at her. I can say that most of her movies have morality messages. Good story and good looking woman are the best entertainment tools. I recommend this movie and all her movies.
